Get the first and last modification time of files of a directory

Source: R/get_info_files.R
get_last_modif.Rd

Get the first and last modification time of files of a directory

Usage

get_last_modif(repo = ".", path = "R", recursive = TRUE, untracked = TRUE)

Arguments

repo

git repository

path

Default to R folder. Use "" for the complete directory

recursive

Logical. Should the listing recurse into directories?

untracked

Logical. Should the not tracked files be included?

Value

A list of files with information of each file:

  • file: file name

  • in_repository: Logical. Whether the file has already been commit once in the git repository

  • first_modif: time of first modification. Commit time if in the git repository, system date of creation otherwise.

  • last_modif: time of last modification. Commit time if in the git repository, system date of last modification otherwise.

Examples

repo <- fake_repo()
# Complete repository
get_last_modif(repo = repo, path = "")
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]]$file
#> [1] "NEWS.md"
#> 
#> [[1]]$in_repository
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> [[1]]$first_modif
#>                     first 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> [[1]]$last_modif
#>                      last 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [[2]]$file
#> [1] "example.txt"
#> 
#> [[2]]$in_repository
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> [[2]]$first_modif
#>                     first 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> [[2]]$last_modif
#>                      last 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> 
repo <- fake_repo(as.package = TRUE)
# Complete repository
get_last_modif(repo = repo, path = "")
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]]$file
#> [1] "NEWS.md"
#> 
#> [[1]]$in_repository
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> [[1]]$first_modif
#>                     first 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> [[1]]$last_modif
#>                      last 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [[2]]$file
#> [1] "example.txt"
#> 
#> [[2]]$in_repository
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> [[2]]$first_modif
#>                     first 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> [[2]]$last_modif
#>                      last 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#> 
#> $untracked.untracked
#> $untracked.untracked$file
#> [1] "R/my_mean.R"
#> 
#> $untracked.untracked$in_repository
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $untracked.untracked$first_modif
#> first 
#>    NA 
#> 
#> $untracked.untracked$last_modif
#>                      last 
#> "2024-03-06 00:55:43 UTC" 
#> 
#>
